io.hekate.metrics.statsd

Class StatsdMetricsConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.hekate.metrics.statsd.StatsdMetricsConfig

  • public class StatsdMetricsConfig
extends Object
    Configuration for StatsdMetricsPlugin.

      • getBatchSize

        public int getBatchSize()
        Returns the maximum number of metrics that should be placed into a single UDP packet (see setBatchSize(int)).
        Returns:
        Maximum number of metrics that should be placed into a single UDP packet.

      • setBatchSize

        public void setBatchSize(int batchSize)
        Sets the maximum number of metrics that should be placed into a single UDP packet.

        If number of metrics that should be published exceeds the value of this parameter then metrics will be split into multiple UDP packets and will be sent independently.

        Value of this parameter must be above zero. Default value is 10.

        Parameters:
        batchSize - Maximum number of metrics that should be placed into a single UDP packet.

      • withBatchSize

        public StatsdMetricsConfig withBatchSize(int batchSize)
        Fluent-style version of setBatchSize(int).
        Parameters:
        batchSize - Maximum number of metrics that should be placed into a single UDP packet.
        Returns:
        This instance.

      • getMaxQueueSize

        public int getMaxQueueSize()
        Returns the maximum size of a queue to buffer metrics for asynchronous publishing (see setMaxQueueSize(int)).
        Returns:
        Maximum queue size.

      • setMaxQueueSize

        public void setMaxQueueSize(int maxQueueSize)
        Sets the the maximum size of a queue to buffer metrics for asynchronous publishing.

        On every LocalMetricsServiceFactory.setRefreshInterval(long) tick a new entry with the snapshot of current metrics is added to the queue of this size. If there is no more space in the queue (f.e. due to some networking issues) then such entries will be dropped and will not be published to StatsD.

        Value of this parameter must be above zero. Default value is 100.

        Parameters:
        maxQueueSize - Maximum queue size.

      • withMaxQueueSize

        public StatsdMetricsConfig withMaxQueueSize(int maxQueueSize)
        Fluent style version of setMaxQueueSize(int).
        Parameters:
        maxQueueSize - Maximum queue size.
        Returns:
        This instance.

      • getFilter

        public MetricFilter getFilter()
        Returns the metrics publishing filter (see setFilter(MetricFilter)).
        Returns:
        Filter.

      • setFilter

        public void setFilter(MetricFilter filter)
        Sets the metrics publishing filter.

        Only those metrics that get accepted by this filter will be published to StatsD.

        Parameters:
        filter - Filter.

      • withFilter

        public StatsdMetricsConfig withFilter(MetricFilter filter)
        Fluent style version of setFilter(MetricFilter).
